description.en: The Lenovo ThinkCentre M80q Gen 4 Tiny (Intel) is a compact 1L business PC designed for productivity. It features up to 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i9 processors with Intel vPro® Enterprise for robust performance. The system supports DDR5 RAM up to 64GB, PCIe Gen4 SSD storage up to 2TB, and offers versatile connectivity with HDMI 2.1, DisplayPort 1.4, and multiple USB ports. Its tool-free chassis allows easy upgrades, while MIL-STD 810H durability ensures reliability. The Tiny form factor supports flexible mounting options and includes energy-efficient certifications like ENERGY STAR® 8.0 and EPEAT® Gold. Ideal for offices, healthcare, and retail environments.
description.es: El Lenovo ThinkCentre M80q Gen 4 Tiny (Intel) es un PC compacto de 1L para empresas. Incluye procesadores Intel® Core™ i9 de 13.ª generación con Intel vPro® Enterprise para alto rendimiento. Admite hasta 64GB de RAM DDR5, almacenamiento SSD PCIe Gen4 de 2TB y conectividad versátil con HDMI 2.1, DisplayPort 1.4 y múltiples puertos USB. Su chasis de apertura sin herramientas facilita actualizaciones, y su diseño resistente cumple con MIL-STD 810H. Certificaciones ENERGY STAR® 8.0 y EPEAT® Gold garantizan eficiencia. Ideal para oficinas, salud y comercio.
